forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 57, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 8 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear. Low around 42, with temperatures rising to around 44 overnight. North northeast wind 3 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
The morning wakes in Downtown San Francisco with a crisp clarity that draws one into its embrace, the sun casting a gentle glow upon the cityscape. As the day unfolds, the forecast whispers promises of warmth, with a high that heralds the comfortable chill typical of this region. While gusts dance through the air with a teasing vigor, the sky remains uncluttered, revealing the contours of the Golden Gate and the storied hills, free from any heavy marine layer or fog that often blankets the bay.

As the sun dips slowly in the western sky, providing a view framed by resilient structures and spindly trees, one could very well wander through a local park or amble down to the bustling waterfront. A lightweight jacket will serve well against the brisk winds that unceremoniously weave between streets, while layers underneath will ensure comfort as the evening approaches. As twilight approaches, the promise of serenity lingers, inviting quiet contemplation or a peaceful gathering with friends in vibrant cafes, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles with the gentle evening air.
